diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with a history of gradually worsening lower abdominal pain, which migrated from the epigastric region to the periumbilical region. Physical examination revealed tenderness in the left lower quadrant (LLQ) and right lower quadrant (RLQ). CT abdomen and pelvis showed a fluid-filled and dilated appendix up to approximately 1.0 cm, with an enlarged tip, indicating acute appendicitis. No other significant intra-abdominal pathology was noted.
